page.title: 17VARIED RELIGION IN ASSYNT
page.content: There are three main denominations in the Parish of Assynt:- the Church of Scotland, The Free Church, & the Free Presbyterian. The Episcopalian Church has a service each month, conducted by a visiting Minister. The Superintendent of the Deep Sea Mission holds services every month. The Roman Catholic Priest conducts sevices here at regular intervals. A new Christian Group called The Beacon Fellowship have started holding Bible Study & Worship Meetings in members homes. Attendences are not large but percentage wise compares well with the national average. Each week there are six Bible Study Groups here each taking its own special form and suiting the individual. All in all, the Community is well served with many & various Religious forms.
